quote: Our condition is most noble  being so beloved of the Most High God that He was willing to die for our sake- which He would not have done if man had not been a most noble creature and of great worth.
quote_letters: OUR CONDITION IS MOST NOBLE BEING SO BELOVED OF THE MOST HIGH GOD THAT HE WAS WILLING TO DIE FOR OUR SAKE- WHICH HE WOULD NOT HAVE DONE IF MAN HAD NOT BEEN A MOST NOBLE CREATURE AND OF GREAT WORTH
